version_description:
EXCITING UPDATE!

● Touch ID support.
● iCloud sync.
● Insert images & photos into notes.
● Save note to Camera Roll.
● Quick Actions - Firmly press Lock Notes icon on your home screen for a quick actions menu.
● Peek & Pop - Firmly press a note in the notes list view for a quick glance of the note's content.
● Japanese localization.
Minor bugs fix and stability.

Option for 6 digits passcode.
